```{r pancreas 31977512, include=FALSE}

PMID_31977512 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('31977512', database = 'PubMed')

citation_31977512 <- paste0(PMID_31977512$journal,' ', PMID_31977512$year, ' ', PMID_31977512$month,';', PMID_31977512$volume,'(', PMID_31977512$number,'):', PMID_31977512$pages)

PubMed_31977512 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_31977512$eprint)

doi_31977512 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_31977512$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
